ocean.question: I am big and blue, and fishies swim in me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I'm made of water!
🚢 Boats like to float on me.
🐳 Big animals live in me

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slow. I live in the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I am a type of animal.
🏠 I carry my home on my back.
🥬 I like to eat green plants.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the sea. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I have no bones.
🎨 I can change colors.
🌊 I live in the ocean.

ocean.question: I am a big fish with sharp teeth! Be careful! What am I?

hints.text: 🐟 I am a type of fish.
🦷 I have lots of pointy teeth.
🌊 I swim in the ocean.

ocean.question: I am a small, colorful fish that lives in the coral reef. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I'm a small fish.
🌈 I have bright colors.
🧱 I live near coral.

ocean.question: I am a very big mammal that lives in the ocean and sings songs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I'm a giant animal.
🎶 I make sounds in the water.
🌊 I breath air but live in the sea.

ocean.question: I'm long and slithery, and I hide in the rocks under the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I look like a snake!
🪨 I stay close to rocks.
🌊 I'm not a fish but still in the sea.

ocean.question: I have a pointy horn on my head and live in the Arctic ocean. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ It is very cold where I live.
🪡 I have a long tusk, like a horn.
🌊 I'm a marine animal.

ocean.question: I am a floating forest in the sea, home to many creatures. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I am a type of seaweed.
🌳 I grow very tall.
🌊 I provide shelter to many sea animals.

ocean.question: I am a very large, old animal with a wrinkly face. I have tusks and swim in the cold ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🧔 I have a mustache!
🥶 I live where it's icy.
🌊 I spend a lot of time in the water.

animal.question: I say 'Moo!' and give you milk. Who am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I make something yummy for your cereal.
🌱 I like to eat grass in a field.
⚫ I have black and white spots sometimes.

animal.question: I meow and like to chase mice. Who am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I like to play with yarn.
🐾 I have soft paws with claws.
😴 I like to take long naps.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🐕 I'm a good friend who loves to play fetch.
🏠 I live in a dog house or inside your house.

animal.question: I quack and like to swim in a pond. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦆 I have webbed feet.
🍞 I like to eat bread crumbs in the park.
🌼 I might lay eggs in a nest by the water.

animal.question: I'm big and gray, with a long trunk. Who am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🐘 I live in Africa and Asia.
👂 I have very big ears.

animal.question: I hop around and like to eat carrots. Who am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I have long ears.
🐰 I have a fluffy tail.
🏡 I live in a burrow.

animal.question: I say 'Neigh' and you can ride on my back. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I like to eat hay.
🐴 I have a long mane and tail.
🤠 People sometimes ride me in rodeos.

animal.question: I'm yellow and black and make honey. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐝 I live in a hive.
🍯 I make something sweet that you can put on toast.
🌼 I fly around to collect nectar from flowers.

animal.question: I roar and I'm the king of the jungle. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I have a big mane.
🥩 I like to eat meat.
☀️ I live in Africa.

animal.question: I slither and have no legs. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I shed my skin.
🐭 I like to eat mice and other small animals.
🌿 I can be found in grass, trees or even the desert.
